knowledges.content: Let me tell you my story. I start as a small spark.
I run wild when the wind carries me.
We are good friends,  you and I.
I am part of your family.
But be careful when you invite me to your home. I don't like to be left alone.

quizzes.question: Fire starts as a small spark.
Fire says it is part of our family.
If there was no fire what problems would we face?
